openThreads.summary: Find apartment in Vienna with registration possibility for visa process
openThreads.notes: Move-in March 15 - April 1. WG-Gesucht being monitored by separate cron.

openThreads.summary: Get US visa for Daniela (Colombian with Austrian residence card)
openThreads.notes: Depends on Vienna apartment with registration. Then Colombia trip after.

openThreads.summary: Figure out what to eat — ongoing daily struggle
openThreads.notes: Food quality in Brașov/Coresi is very poor. Major stress point.

context: Cata & Dani are in Brașov (Coresi) until April 1. Moving to Vienna for 1-2 months to get Daniela's US visa sorted (she's Colombian with Austrian residence). Then Colombia to visit her family. Food is a huge daily struggle — bad quality in the area, never know what to eat. Daniela dealing with acne and hair loss, seeing dermatologist.
